caption: React
name: France Mattille
description: Implementation of a design realized by Zati.

caption: WebApp with Scala Play
name: SpeKtro
description: SpeKtro is an interactive dashboard for exploring non-visual spectrum lighting for human health. The main goal is to help the user to develop a conceptual understanding of the various ways of evaluating spectral effectiveness of ocular light exposure using the RSE factor and gain sufficient knowledge to support its usage.

caption: Jenkins Plugin
name: LSI Jenkins
description: The project was to design a Jenkins plugin to be able to let user to try and use a tool similar to ABC. In a second phase, the idea was to rebuild the LAPSubmit plugin in order to be more generic.
code: Bash, Perl, Groovy, Java, Jenkins Plugins (Java, Groovy)

caption: Java application
name: Secure-Communication-Module
description: This secure communication module started being a communication channel between real state agencies and the State of Geneva.

caption: Design on FPGA
name: Bachelor Project - ARM based Dynamic Scheduling
description: The main target of my Bachelor project was to design a dynamically scheduled processor based on the ARM architecture. And then compare it to a multicycle version.

caption: Jenkins Plugin
name: LAP Submit
description: Design of the Computer Architecture laboratory automated grading system built on top of Jenkins (jenkins-ci.org) interconnecting several system together.
code: Bash, Perl, Groovy, Java, Jenkins Plugins (Java, Groovy)

caption: Android App
name: ForumEPFL
description: Design of the Android application to have access to the program, find a company's presentation date, localize a specific stand, read companies profiles and log in to your user account.

caption: Android App

description: Creation of the prototype of an Android App to fetch and perform multiple professional medical diagnostics and connect the test results through mobile application.

caption: iOS App

description: iPhone application that allows the user to go through a database of cars and check their features.

caption: WebApp with Spring

description: Design of the WebApp to manage the semester projects of the LAP lab.

caption: RaspPi / Android / uC
name: ARPiBot
description: ARPi-Bot which stands for Android-Raspberry Pi-Bot is a project to build a robot upon a Raspberry Pi, an Android device and a Silicon Laboratories C8051F340 board.

caption: Java application
name: eBlast - BitTorrent client
description: eBlast is BitTorrent client co-developped with David Dieulivol. The aim was to gain further experience with the OOP paradigm and various design patterns.
